name: Lost Topia: NExT is You
description:
An exploring adventure that need many players' efforts.

Goal:

Try to find and reactivate 4 relics of the Topia Civilization.

Gameplay:

It's a turn-based strategy game. Manage your health and energy, choose the most efficient path, and get supplies in time.

Stand higher will make you see further.

Leave useful marks for future explorer, and complete the goal together.

How To Play:

WSAD-Move

Right Click-Mark Target Block, which will Make it Visible Forever
